modShortDescription: This 7 Days to Die mod makes the vehicles faster for A17 and A18. Bicycle, Minibike, Motorcycle, 4x4 Truck and Gyrocopter vehicles will now move faster.
modDescription:
This 7 Days to Die mod makes the vehicles faster for A17 and A18\. Moreover, it makes changes to all vehicles. Bicycle, Minibike, Motorcycle, 4×4 Truck and Gyrocopter [vehicles](https://7daystodiemods.com/tag/7-days-to-die-vehicles/) will now move faster.

To return to the glorious period of the A16 (the Minibike was fast), Razor made a mod that increased the maximum speed of all vehicles by at least 50%.

## Changes

* **Faster Bicycle:** 36 km/h (before) —> 54 km/h (after)
* **Faster Minibike:** 36 km/h (before) —> 64.8 km/h (after)
* **Faster Motorcycle:** 50.4 km/h (before) —> 86.4 km/h (after)
* **Faster 4×4 Truck:** 46.8 km/h (before) —> 81 km/h (after)
* **Faster Gyrocopter:** 36 km/h (before) —> 54 km/h (after)

Razor doesn’t think this is too strong or weak changes compared to A16, but feel free to adjust values to your heart’s desire.

## Installing

To install this mod, unzip the file and place it inside “/7 Days to Die/Mods”. If “Mods” folder doesn’t exist, just create one.

[Download](https://docs.google.com/uc?export=download&id=1Fir7PczRXsD-jTZM6esjjaMHSebME0WE)

The forum topic of the mod is [here](https://community.7daystodie.com/topic/8303-faster-vehicles/).

**Credits:** Razor
